# dragColor(_:with:from:)

**Type Method**

Drags a color into a destination view from the specified source view.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor class func dragColor(_ color: NSColor, with event: NSEvent, from sourceView: NSView) -> Bool
```

## Parameters

- **color**: The color to drag.
- **event**: The drag event.
- **sourceView**: The view from which the color was dragged.

## Return Value

[doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/true]

## Discussion

This method is usually invoked by the `mouseDown:` method of `sourceView`. The dragging mechanism handles all subsequent events.

Because it is a class method, [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSColorPanel/dragColor(_:with:from:)] can be invoked whether or not the instance of `NSColorPanel` exists.

## Setting color

- **color**: The color of the receiver.
